verses.verse: A Prayer of David. <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H6664>right<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H7181>attend<s%> unto my <S%H7440>cry<s%>; Give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, that goeth <S%H3808>not<s%> out of <S%H4820>feigned<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
Let my <S%H4941>sentence<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> from thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>; Let thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>look<s%> upon <S%H4339>equity<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H974>proved<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%>; Thou hast <S%H6485>visited<s%> me in the <S%H3915>night<s%>; Thou hast <S%H6884>tried<s%> <S%H4672>me<s%>, and findest <S%H2161>nothing<s%>; I am purposed that my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall not <S%H5674>transgress<s%>.
As for the <S%H6468>works<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> me from the <S%H734>ways<s%> of the <S%H6530>violent<s%>.
My <S%H838>steps<s%> have held <S%H8551>fast<s%> to thy <S%H4570>paths<s%>, My <S%H6471>feet<s%> have not <S%H4131>slipped<s%>.
I have <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H6030>thee<s%>, for thou wilt answer <S%H410>me<s%>, O God: <S%H5186>Incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, and hear my <S%H565>speech<s%>.

Show thy <S%H6395>marvellous<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, O thou that <S%H3467>savest<s%> by thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> them that take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in thee From those that rise up against <S%H6965>them<s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of the <S%H1323>eye<s%>; <S%H5641>Hide<s%> me under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of thy <S%H3671>wings<s%>,
From <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> <S%H7703>oppress<s%> <S%H5315>me<s%>, My deadly <S%H341>enemies<s%>, that compass me <S%H5362>about<s%>.
They are <S%H5462>inclosed<s%> in their own <S%H2459>fat<s%>: With their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1348>proudly<s%>.
They have now <S%H5437>compassed<s%> us in our <S%H838>steps<s%>; They <S%H7896>set<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to cast us <S%H5186>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
He is <S%H1825>like<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> that is <S%H3700>greedy<s%> of his <S%H2963>prey<s%>, And as it were a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H3427>lurking<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places<s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H6923>Confront<s%> <S%H6440>him<s%>, cast him <S%H3766>down<s%>: <S%H6403>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> by thy <S%H2719>sword<s%>;

From <S%H4962>men<s%> by thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, From <S%H4962>men<s%> of the <S%H2465>world<s%>, whose <S%H2506>portion<s%> is in this <S%H2416>life<s%>, And whose <S%H990>belly<s%> thou <S%H4390>fillest<s%> with thy <S%H6840>treasure<s%>: They are <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H1121>children<s%>, And <S%H3240>leave<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of their substance to their <S%H5768>babes<s%>.
As for <S%H2372>me<s%>, I shall behold thy <S%H6440>face<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; I shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>, when I <S%H6974>awake<s%>, with beholding thy <S%H8544>form<s%>.
